name: Assistance with discovery
text:
§576B-318  Assistance with discovery.  A tribunal of this State may:
     (1)  Request a tribunal outside this State to assist in obtaining discovery; and
     (2)  Upon request, compel a person over which it has jurisdiction to respond to a discovery order issued by a tribunal outside this State. [L 1997, c 295, pt of §1; am L 2015, c 77, pt of §1]
